cover_prompt.placeholder: Input the description of the red packet cover you want to generate

note.main: The cover image downloaded here cannot be used directly for WeChat red packets. You can upload it to the WeChat Red Packet Cover Open Platform to customize your red packet cover.

video_prompt.placeholder: Input the description of the red packet cover video you want to generate

default_sample.image_prompt: The IP image of Chinese dragon, Chinese dragon head, the horns of the dragon, dinosaur tail, cute, cute, colorful, twelve zodiac dragons, wearing lion dance, hand made copper coins, cute expressions, smiles, super details.
default_sample.video_prompt: The IP image of Chinese dragon, Chinese dragon head, the horns of the dragon, dinosaur tail, cute, cute, colorful, twelve zodiac dragons, wearing lion dance, hand made copper coins, cute expressions, smiles, super details.

cover_image.sample_1_prompt: The IP image of Chinese dragon, Chinese dragon head, the horns of the dragon, dinosaur tail, cute, cute, colorful, twelve zodiac dragons, wearing lion dance, hand made copper coins, cute expressions, smiles, super details.
cover_image.sample_2_prompt: a cute China God of Wealth print sticker, A lovely God of Wealth in China holds a gold ingot in his hand and is surrounded by gold coins, in the style of 2d game art, patrick brown, qiu shengxian, children's book illustrations, figura serpentinata.
cover_image.sample_3_prompt: A family is celebrating a little boy's birthday with a big birthday cake in front of them, filled with candles. There are many colorful balloons and ribbons around. Everyone's faces were filled with happy and joyful smiles.
cover_image.sample_4_prompt: A cute rabbit is grinding in the courtyard, with a bright moon behind it. The courtyard has an antique style, with lanterns hanging and many peach trees.
cover_image.sample_5_prompt: A football player is sweating on the field as he kicks the ball into the goal, with excited spectators behind him.
cover_image.sample_6_prompt: Celebratory Red and Family Gathering Theme, Incorporating Chinese Dragon and Symbolic Plane Design, Emphasis on Xiqing and New Year Festivities, Rich in Chinese Cultural Elements, Featuring Soft and Warm Color Schemes, Dynamic and Vivid Illustrations, Minimalistic Approach to Colorful Murals.
cover_image.sample_7_prompt: A cute little yellow duck is taking a bath, with bubbles and a bathtub, hand-painted cartoon style, and rich colors.
cover_image.sample_8_prompt: Mysterious Garden, a pushed open wooden window, outside the window is a garden full of various flowers, with beautiful colors.
cover_image.sample_9_prompt: Snow Mountain, there is a lake at the foot of the mountain.
cover_image.sample_10_prompt: A valley with lush trees, where a waterfall cascades down from the mountaintop, splashing water on the lake surface at the foot of the mountain, creating a spectacular scene.
cover_image.sample_11_prompt: New Year atmosphere, a family gathered around a round table for a meal. The interior walls, floor, and dining table are all decorated in a festive red and yellow theme. The table is laden with a variety of delicious dishes. There is a window in the background, with snowflakes gently falling outside. The family is happily enjoying their New Year's Eve dinner together.
cover_image.sample_12_prompt: The beautiful Princess Elsa stands in the snow, with snow and trees in the background, and many snowflakes drifting in the sky
cover_image.sample_13_prompt: Simple pattern design with pink and purple theme colors
cover_image.sample_14_prompt: The God of Wealth, with a smile on his face, is a wealthy man dressed in ancient official attire. He holds a gold ingot in his left hand, a ruyi in his right hand, and steps on a qilin.
cover_image.sample_15_prompt: The cute Disney Mickey Mouse reached out to show the huge castle behind him, with many balloons floating in the blue sky in the background.
cover_image.sample_16_prompt: A surfer is surfing on the sea, with waves rolling up and seagulls flying under the blue sky and white clouds.
cover_image.sample_17_prompt: The primitive forest is covered with mushrooms, with many moss on the ground and vines on the trees. Many animals hide here to live.
cover_image.sample_18_prompt: A cute little dog and kitten are nestled together in the living room, with a wooden window above. A flower pot is placed on the windowsill, and outside the window, it's already dark with a moon hanging.

cover_video.sample_3_prompt: A family of four gathers around the cake table, clapping their hands and singing the birthday song. and the balloons around gently sway.
cover_video.sample_11_prompt: A family sits around the table enjoying a steaming hot New Year's Eve dinner, while snow falls outside the window.
cover_video.sample_12_prompt: Elsa, the Snow Queen, stands in the snow waving at you, as snowflakes gently fall continuously from the sky.
cover_video.sample_15_prompt: Mickey Mouse is smiling with arms outstretched in a welcoming gesture, while many balloons are slowly rising into the sky behind him.
cover_video.sample_16_prompt: In the waves, there is a person surfing, with the sea rising and falling.
